content: I'm thinking of a coffee table with a glass top and a wicker or rattan base. The glass top will provide a sleek, modern touch, while the wicker or rattan base will add a coastal vibe. I've seen some beautiful pieces at West Elm and Crate & Barrel, but I want to explore other options as well. Do you think I should consider shopping during a sale or using coupons to stay within my budget?
